channel.title: [Advice?] Cleaning sources for people.. [Advice?]
channel.description:
Heya all.
Just came to my senses, when making a server i came to think;
"what am i doing this for?" "why when i cannot host?"
So i thought long and hard, i thinik it's fun and exciting to code servers, but because i cannot host, the most i could host would be like 5 - 10hours on weekend days.
Right, so basically what i want from you members is a bit of support, ideas (suggestions) and then i can be doing some requests, getting rep hopefully. Etc.
So basically all i want you guys to do is take a little time lookign at sources you think *could* be good for a starter, and then post them here, download link if possible. And then i can pick sources to clean & Release!
I hope all my work from now on helps all you guys, coding / "need a clean source" etc.
Also when you post a source for me to clean pick a suitable for me to name this, once i've cleaned it.
So here's what you should post:
[tt]Source name: Source Download link: (if av.) Requested name: (This is the name you want it to be called after been cleaned) Name: (your member name, goes into the source to say you recommended it to be cleaned) Other info: (self-explanotory) [/tt]
Thanks to all who support and suggest me :D
-- Suggested Sources -- NONE
-- Suggested to-not be used -- Hiyascape V.2 (Quite a few glitches.)

item.title: [Advice?] Cleaning sources for people.. [Advice?]
item.dc:creator: @runormal runormal
item.description:
@runormal wrote:

Glithces meh who cares just fix em

Read full topic

item.title: [Advice?] Cleaning sources for people.. [Advice?]
item.dc:creator: @Envion Envion
item.description:
@Envion wrote:

zubmage:

May I suggest one that you SHOULDN’T use? Hiyascape v2. Although it is an extremely popular one, there are quite a few glitches.

Glitches, or errors the “author” is too ignorant to solve?

RS2DV2 is a great core to build from.

Read full topic

item.title: [Advice?] Cleaning sources for people.. [Advice?]
item.dc:creator: @skiller_noob1 skiller noob1
item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

[quote=“Ixl Adds Ixl, post:4, topic:187104”]Well…personally I don’t want to give out my source because you’ll be taking rep from what I claim. So umm…no. Also posted this so you can get my opinion about this idea - although I do think it is quite fascinating, still… I’m to cautious to give you my source so once again, no. Voted very good btw… Umm, if your not going to post your then why post at all? And you only have 35 Rep…

Your Sincerely
LOL[/quote]
Then why post at all? Remember your rep isn’t your dick size.
And a source not to use is Project Czar. Why? It’s a peice of shit.

Read full topic

opinion? don’t people want facts now? opinions are so last year!
